    public class LoginActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements android.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<android.database.Cursor>
    A login screen that offers login via email/password.

      • attemptLogin

        public void attemptLogin()
        Attempts to sign in or register the account specified by the login form. If there are form errors (invalid email, missing fields, etc.), the errors are presented and no actual login attempt is made.

      • getUserResponse

        public void getUserResponse(java.lang.String userEmail,

        Attempts to log in the user and checks credentials with the server
        Parameters:
        userEmail - Email the user is trying to log in with
        userPassword - Password the user is trying to log in with
